description: Hiro is a year older than http://anidb.net/ch7056 [Yuno] and http://anidb.net/ch7057 [Miyako], living directly under Yuno`s apartment. Although she tries to be a supportive senpai to the girls, she tends to worry excessively about her weight, causing her to go on diets for periods while occasionally binging on sweets. A childhood friend of http://anidb.net/ch7059 [Sae], she is one of her neighbor`s principal sources of support when she is involved with a deadline or other crisis.
name: Hiro
